price: 81. Waxaana doonnay inuu ugu beddelo Rabbigood mid ka khayr roon daahirinimo oo naxariisasho dhow.
arabic: فَأَرَدۡنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَهُمَا رَبُّهُمَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُ زَكَوٰةٗ وَأَقۡرَبَ رُحۡمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-aradnā an yub'dilahumā rabbuhumā khayran min'hu zakatan wa-aqraba ruḥ'man
